title: EdTech Integration Competency Development for Online Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: Project-based learning conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, primarily involving student and job-seeking participants.

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement math problem-solving projects using EdTech tools.
Learners strengthen peer feedback and group discussion competencies using online collaboration tools.
Learners perform content creation and evaluation processes on a smartphone-based EdTech platform.
Learners establish strategies for selecting and applying appropriate EdTech tools through learning context analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
